name: Salty Dawg
description: The classic Salty Dog can be made with vodka or gin. I like the gin version, with a bit of tart lime added in for extra brightness.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces gin, such as Tanqueray No. 10
3 ounces fresh grapefruit juice, from 1 large pink grapefruit
1/2 ounce fresh lime juice, from 1 lime

recipeInstructions.text: Add gin and grapefruit juice to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into ice-filled glass, add salt on top and serve.
